text: Due Date is a 2010 American comedy road movie. It was produced by Todd Phillips, Daniel Goldberg, and Susan Downey and was directed by Todd Phillips. The movie was released on November 5, 2010. The movie has cameo appearances from Two and a Half Men stars Charlie Sheen and Jon Cryer. Architect Peter and wannabe actor Ethan drive from Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport to Los Angeles. ==Cast== * Robert Downey, Jr. as Peter Highman * Zach Galifianakis as Ethan Tremblay / Ethan Chase * Michelle Monaghan as Sarah Highman * Juliette Lewis as Heidi * Jamie Foxx as Darryl * RZA as Airline Screener Marshall * Matt Walsh as TSA Agent * Danny McBride as Western Union Employee Lonnie * Todd Phillips as Barry * Mimi Kennedy as Sarah's Mom * Keegan Michael Key as New Father * Aaron Lustig as Dr. Greene * Nathalie Fay as Flight Attendant * Sharon Morris as Airport X-ray * Marco Rodr√≠guez as Federali Agent * Howard Fine as himself (voice) * Charlie Sheen as himself / Charlie Harper (cameo) * Jon Cryer as himself / Alan Harper (cameo) ==Other websites== * Due Date at Warner Brothers.com * * Category:2010 buddy movies Category:2010 comedy movies Category:2010s road movies Category:American buddy comedy movies Category:American road movies Category:2010s buddy comedy movies Category:Comedy road movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies set in Alabama Category:Movies set in Arizona Category:Movies set in Atlanta Category:Movies set in California Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:Movies set in Louisiana Category:Movies set in Mississippi Category:Movies set in New Mexico Category:Movies set in Texas Category:Pregnancy movies Category:Movies directed by Todd Phillips Category:Warner Bros. movies
title: Due Date
